se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.pdf

Class VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.pdf.VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extensible

    public class VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement
extends Object
implements Extensible
    Class that represents the requirement for including a visible indication stating that a PDF document has been signed, and by whom.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

        public String getTemplateImageRef()

        Parameters:

      • getSignerName

        public VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement.SignerName getSignerName()
        Name of the signer to be represented in the visible image. This is typically a name of the signer but any suitable identity attribute value may be specified to be part of the signer name. This value is analogous to, and should hold the same value as, a present Name entry in the PDF signature dictionary. If the image template referenced requires a value for signerName, this field is mandatory, otherwise it is optional. the signer name
        Returns:
        the signer name

      • setSignerName

        public void setSignerName(VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement.SignerName signerName)
        Name of the signer to be represented in the visible image. This is typically a name of the signer but any suitable identity attribute value may be specified to be part of the signer name. This value is analogous to, and should hold the same value as, a present Name entry in the PDF signature dictionary. If the image template referenced requires a value for signerName, this field is mandatory, otherwise it is optional.
        Parameters:
        signerName - the signer name

      • getScale

        public Integer getScale()
        The scale of the final visible signature image expressed as zoom percentage. The value -100 represents a 0 sized image, the value 0 represents unaltered size, the value 100 double size and so on. If null, 0 is assumed. the scale of the final visible signature image
        Returns:
        the scale of the final visible signature image

      • setScale

        public void setScale(Integer scale)
        The scale of the final visible signature image expressed as zoom percentage. The value -100 represents a 0 sized image, the value 0 represents unaltered size, the value 100 double size and so on. If null, 0 is assumed.
        Parameters:
        scale - the scale of the final visible signature image

      • getPage

        public Integer getPage()
        The number of the page where the visible signature should appear. A value of 1 represents the first page and a value of 0 (or null) represents the last page. the page where the visible signature should appear
        Returns:
        the page where the visible signature should appear

      • setPage

        public void setPage(Integer page)
        The number of the page where the visible signature should appear. A value of 1 represents the first page and a value of 0 (or null) represents the last page.
        Parameters:
        page - the page where the visible signature should appear

      • getFieldValues

        public Map<String,String> getFieldValues()
        Apart from the signer name and signing date, a template may use other fields. This map provides the requested fields and values. a map of fields and their values
        Returns:
        a map of fields and their values
